flawed_nl_solution:
Matt spent on math and science 30% + 40% = 70% of the time.
This means he did homework from these two subjects for 7/10 * 150 minutes = <<7/10*150=150>>150 minutes.
So Matt spent 150 minutes - 150 minutes = <<150-150=0>>0 minutes doing homework from other subjects.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 105, not 150. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
